Blog.post: im tall, i have black hair, im big, im bored, im here, im there, im everywhere, im alone, im disgusted, im sick and all, i have nothing to do, i have important things to do, i am not happy and i am somtimes sad, i love to chat with australians, i love to chat, i hate things, and i love things, im hungry, im horni, im allergic, i love dogs, i love cats, and i love other pets, i hate school, i hate teachers, i like to learn, im not in sports very much, i crave, i grow, i shop, i wear clothes, i take shower, and i love my parents, im a christian, im a student, im not really popular, i would love to be popular, im going through puberty, im getting fat, and im getting thin, i love movies, and i love shows, im not patient, i want to be always exited, i love US, and i love new york, i hate this and i hate that, i love this and i love that, im here, im there ,but out of all that i love being 15.

my life is boring and sad but somtyms its exiting and happy. i love this place but not my town. i live in American but im born in asia. i love alot of things and alot of pipol. i love to go to a place whre i would live happy and free. i want to be a good looking guy that gurls would always want. i want to have a perfect body with nice mucles and abbs. i love my friends and my friends love me. i like my family but im not happy. i hate some pipol and some pipol hate me. im a christian and i play piano. i love music and want to compose music my self. i love to listen to christian music and somtimes hiphop and rap. i love to do alot of things and learn alot of things but i hate school. somtimes i ask this questions to my self, am i gay? do i like gurls? do i like guys? am i strait? am i gonna be a pornstar when i grow up? am i going to have good life in the future? am i ever gonna be a popular celebrety? these the the questions i always ask my self but yet i dont have the answeres to. i somtimes wish im popular and that everyone loves me and appreciate me. i want to be a good looking handsome guy somtimes. somtimes i masturbate but now i do it everyday because i cant stop my self from doing it. im addicted to masturbating and im also addicted to watching porn. somtimes i wish to have real sex with a guy or a gurl but i kno ill never will. this is my life. this life could come true or this life might not come true. i might grow up as nice person and i might be just a person standing in the corner for money. i cant think of anything else but bad things. i want to be just normal like other pipol. thats all me. my life, my future, my-self.
